summary: Some time after their botched operation to capture a known Palestinian terrorist, a team of Israeli agents starts to get killed off one by one. Their leader must get to the bottom of things before the killer(s) plan is complete.
cast: Christopher Lambert|Kerry Fox|Vincent Regan|Cal MacAninch|Nicolas de Pruyssenaere|Donald Sumpter|Maryam d'Abo|Oliver Haden|Hendrick Haese|William Armstrong|Martin Siegel|Marco Maes|Patrick Hastert|Lisa van Laarhoven|Guido Molinaro|Diana Wiersma|Saul Reichlin|Tobias Licht|Patrick Dean|Tristan Lignier|Hajib Razzak|Derek Kueter|Ken Samuels|Ben Andrews|Jean-Luc Ristic|Gilles Soeder|Michaël Morris|Peronella Van Kastel|Gary Cowan|Malcolm Turner|Jesse Joe Walsh|Ann Overstall Comfort|Robert L. Hall|Bruce MacEwen|Joseph Sayagh|Leslie Woodhall|Barbara Sarafian|Pieter Riemens|Christian Reiss|Michael Reuben|Christopher P. Kibbey|Julian Nest|Samir Bezzah|Serge Wolf|Atamna Ouidadi|Özkan Arslan|Radica Jovicic
keywords: murder of a nude man|murder of a nude woman|shootout|gunfight|street shootout
title: The Point Men (En el punto de mira)
